featuredEntity.text2: Average value from all company information currently available in this category.
featuredEntity.text3: Highest value for a single company, based on currently available company information.
dataTypes.text1: Amount of all data types a company shares.
dataTypes.text2: Amount of times this data type is shared with other companies.
category.text2: Data types not in this category
category.text3: The size of each circle represents the number of times this datatype is shared with other companies.
purpose.text1: Representation of the number of times this purpose is mentioned.
purpose.text2: Number of times this purpose is mentioned.
companies.text1: Each dot represents a single company.
companies.text2: The dots in the circle represent the companies that receive data.
companies.text3: Later the same total amount of dots are grouped by industries.
companies.text8: Here you can see if data from interactions with this company will be shared with others in a particular industry, e.g. Advertising/Marketing.
lineChartInfo.textLabel1: Each line shows the development of values over time
lineChartInfo.textLabel2: Nonlinear logarithmic scale displaying monthly active users
purposesBarChartInfo.textAverageValue: Average value from all messenger information currently available in this category
purposesBarChartInfo.textHighestValue: Highest value for a single purpose, based on currently available messenger information
